alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:14AM CDT until June 10 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 214 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Amber to near Dibble to 8 miles northeast of Bray, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Blanchard, Pauls Valley, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Lindsay, Lexington, Goldsby, Maysville, Dibble, Wayne, Washington, Paoli, Cole, Alex, Amber, Bradley, Rosedale and Tabler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
